'''Masterless Stardust''' can only be received from [[Wishes]], and in particular you will get 15 Masterless Stardust for every 3-star weapon you receive. The only current use for Masterless Stardust is to trade it in for other items in the [[Paimon's Bargains]] shop. To see other rewards from wishing, see [[Wishes#Masterless Items|Masterless Items]].
